document.full_text: juan carlos paniagua, a right-hander from the dominican republic who can throw 100 miles an hour, signed with the yankees for $1.1 million.
document.title: yankees are enthused about a hard-throwing dominican pitcher
lines_and_colors: juan carlos paniagua, a right-hander from the dominican republic who can throw 100 miles an hour, signed with the yankees for $1.1 million.
